prefix.description: Sets the bot prefix, or shows the current prefix.
prefix.missingPerms: You need the Manage Server permission to change the prefix!
prefix.noGuild: The current prefix of the bot is `{{prefix}}`.
prefix.set: My prefix was successfully set to `{{prefix}}`!

extended.extendedHelp: Sets a guild prefix if provided. Or shows the current guild prefix.

language.description: Sets the bot's language, or shows the current language.
language.missingPerms: You need the Manage Server permission to change the language!
language.noGuild: The current language of the bot is `{{language}}`.
language.set: My language was successfully set to `{{language}}`!

extended.extendedHelp: Sets a guild language if provided. Or shows the current guild language.

download.description: Gives the download link for our desktop app!

embed.description:
Download our desktop app [`here`]({{link}})!

`.dmg` - MacOS
`.msi` - Windows
`.deb` - Linux

extended.extendedHelp: Gives instructions on how to download our desktop app!
